entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 18 except 12 near Lake Superior. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 18 except 12 near Lake Superior. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 11 May 2023
